data.content:
noun
plural ~ -ers
[count] disapproving :a place or situation in which people make and discuss theories about problems (such as poverty and racism) without having any experience with those problems
The book was written by some college professor who's spent her entire professional life in an ivory tower. - often used before another noun
an ivory-tower intellectual

tháp ngà
lead an ivory tower existence
sống trong tháp ngà
